column4: I run ubuntu 11.04. Can I make my apt-get install command point to the repositories of the newer Ubuntu versions so I can get newer software?
you will cause a distribution upgrade that may not work
hmm...so if I want to say, download a newer version of php than what's available in my repo, then I have to add a 3rd party PPA?
yes, or compile it, the ppa choice is the key, anyone can create a ppa
